Class AbstractLifecycle

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.core.AbstractLifecycle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Lifecycle
public abstract class AbstractLifecycle extends Object implements Lifecycle
Abstract base class providing lifecycle management for Neon components. Handles state transitions, listener notification, and thread safety.
Since:
1.1

    • start

      public void start()
      Description copied from interface: Lifecycle
      Starts the component asynchronously. Transitions from CREATED to STARTING, then to RUNNING on success.
      Specified by:
      start in interface Lifecycle

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Description copied from interface: Lifecycle
      Stops the component gracefully. Transitions from RUNNING to STOPPING, then to STOPPED. Waits for pending operations to complete up to the configured timeout.
      Specified by:
      stop in interface Lifecycle

    • doStart

      protected abstract void doStart() throws Exception
      Performs the actual start logic. Called after state transitions to STARTING.
      Throws:
      Exception - if start fails

    • doStop

      protected abstract void doStop() throws Exception
      Performs the actual stop logic. Called after state transitions to STOPPING.
      Throws:
      Exception - if stop encounters errors
